sources.title: Hotel Continental
sources.description: The night before the famous Hotel Continental will be torn down, a gangster returns to grab the loot that he hid there many years ago.

sources.title: Hotel Continental (1932) PRE-CODE HOLLYWOOD
sources.description:
Stars: Peggy Shannon, Theodore von Eltz, J. Farrell 
Director: Christy Cabanne

A posh hotel is about to close its doors forever. When a paroled convict returns to the hotel to recover stolen loot he hid there years earlier, he saves a woman from suicide, unaware that she has been hired by crooks to spirit the loot away from him!

metadata.Plot: (1932, Tiffany) Peggy Shannon, Theodore Von Eltz, Alan Mowbray. A posh hotel is about to close its doors forever. A paroled convict comes back to the hotel to find stolen funds he hid there years earlier. He saves a woman from suicide, unaware that she has been hired by crooks to spirit the loot away from him. This early Tiffany talkie is pretty good. 16mm.
metadata.Writer: Warren Duff, F. Hugh Herbert, Paul Perez
metadata.Actors: Peggy Shannon, Theodore von Eltz, J. Farrell MacDonald
